title: NitroCrossNetwork
author: NitroCrossNetwork
content: Nitro Cross Network is a technology analysis project that aims to provide a strengthened and accelerated cross-chain & bridge structure to solve the problems that occur in blockchain infrastructures where cross-chains constantly fail and major hacking events occur.Access to cross-chain & bridge foundations powered by Crypto encryption systemsSecure BridgesIt provides an accelerated infrastructure ecosystem based on cross-chain networks.Fast - FastAll ownership is left to the community to provide community benefit.Community DevsThe Nitro Cross Network project is a BEP20 Token using the Binance Smart Chain network. The Nitro Cross Network project, whose biggest feature aims to provide community benefit, is used with the abbreviation NITS. NITS Token has been offered to the launched with a rate of 92.6% and its liquidity is locked at 100%. 3% commission is charged for marketing expenses.Contract Address (BSC/BEP20)0x9c56c3d8eeeafc036004a5c542d094d512f07341https://nitrocross.networkhttps://t.me/NitroCrossNetwork
